ca.ualberta.cs.funtime_runtime

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.funtime_runtime.Question
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Question
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is a model class for questions Question consists of a title, body, username, list of replies, list of answers, date and rating Question can also consist of a Photo, if a photo is attached
    Author:
    Pranjali Pokharel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
